name: OctopusCreateRelease
description: Create a Release in Octopus Deploy
author: Octopus Deploy

inputs.name: Space
inputs.label: Space
inputs.helpMarkDown: The space within Octopus. This must be the name of the space, not the id.

inputs.name: Project
inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project within Octopus. This must be the name of the project, not the id.

inputs.name: ReleaseNumber
inputs.label: Release Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number to use for this release. You can leave this blank if the release number is calculated by Octopus.

inputs.name: Channel
inputs.label: Channel
inputs.helpMarkDown: The [channel](https://g.octopushq.com/Channels) to use for the release. This must be the name of the channel, not the id.

inputs.name: DefaultPackageVersion
inputs.label: Default Package Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set this to provide a default package version to use for all packages on all steps. Can be used in conjunction with the Packages field, which can be used to override versions for specific packages.

inputs.name: Packages
inputs.label: Packages
inputs.helpMarkDown: A multi-line list of version numbers to use for a package in the release. Format: StepName:Version or PackageID:Version or StepName:PackageName:Version. StepName, PackageID, and PackageName can be replaced with an asterisk ('*'). An asterisk will be assumed for StepName, PackageID, or PackageName if they are omitted.

inputs.name: ReleaseNotes
inputs.label: Release Notes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Octopus Release notes. This field supports markdown. To include newlines, you can use HTML linebreaks. Can only specify this if 'ReleaseNotesFile' is not supplied.

inputs.name: ReleaseNotesFile
inputs.label: Release Notes File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Octopus Release notes file. Path to a file that contains the release notes. Supports markdown. Can only specify this if 'ReleaseNotes' is not supplied.

inputs.name: GitRef
inputs.label: Git Reference
inputs.helpMarkDown: Git branch reference to use when creating the release for version controlled Projects.

inputs.name: GitCommit
inputs.label: Git Commit
inputs.helpMarkDown: Git commit to use when creating the release for version controlled Projects. Use in conjunction with the gitRef parameter to select any previous commit.

inputs.name: IgnoreIfAlreadyExists
inputs.label: Ignore Existing Release
inputs.helpMarkDown: If enabled will not attempt to create a new release if there is already one with the same version number

inputs.name: AdditionalArguments
inputs.label: Additional Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments are no longer supported. This field has been retained to ease migration from earlier versions of the step but values should be moved to the appropriate fields.

OutputVariables.name: release_number
OutputVariables.description: The Octopus Deploy release number assigned to the Release.
